name: CIOOS Pacific Data Catalogue
description: Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System Pacific Data Catalogue, a digital network collecting freely accessible marine data resources

geotopics.description: Includes data related to marine environments, such as fish abundance, coral cover, phytoplankton, and biogeochemical variables.
Environmental monitoring data including nutrients, oxygen, particulate matter, etc.
Biological and ecosystem datasets such as marine biodiversity, microbe biomass, and seagrass cover.
